listing.listing_description: _ Please note Penthouse on Beach is staffed with an on-site property manager who will tend to your daily requests. The property manager has a desk at the main reception of the Villa where he/she may go from time to time to manage the business aspects of the property. If you prefer not to have anyone on-site during your stay for complete privacy, please inform your Villa Specialist as this can be arranged._ Perched high above the exclusive Camps Bay enclave near Cape Town, Penthouse on Beach offers spectacular views of Table Bay, the Atlantic Ocean, and the white-sand beaches below. Its three beautiful bedroom suites sleep six, and its naturally elegant décor exude peace and class, making it an ideal choice for families and groups of friends seeking privacy and privileged vistas on this gorgeous coast of South Africa.Your luxury villa features an outdoor terrace with comfortable loungers and an elevated infinite swimming pool, offering unparalleled ocean views. With a comfortable outdoor lounge and alfresco dining table as well, it's the ideal sanctuary for relishing the ocean breeze and glasses of delicious South African wine. Lovely lighting allows you to savor the fresh air well into the night.Floor-to-ceiling glass doors open from the terrace into the villa's luminous interior. Here, the stunning views are the main show, with multiple comfortable lounge areas arrayed by large windows offering expansive bird's-eye vistas of the city, mountains, and ocean. The fully equipped kitchen also features inspiring views, as well as a comfortable breakfast bar, while the dining table offers the perfect setting for memorable dinners together. The villa's décor is exquisite throughout, with contemporary design themes and original artwork complemented by natural materials that root you to the beautiful land and seascapes surrounding you.The villa's views and serene natural light continue in the sumptuous bedrooms, where each has a unique vantage of your unforgettable surroundings. The Deluxe Room features a double size bed, a private balcony, clear views of Robben Island, and an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower, while both the Table View Room and the Ocean View room include queen beds and ensuite bathrooms with stand-alone shower and bath.From the villa's high perch, you're within easy reach of the cultural and natural riches of Cape Town and its environs. Sunset Beach is just a five-minute walk down the road, while the beaches and nightlife of Camps Bay are an easy drive away. Cape Town itself is also just a short drive from your door, while just beyond the city is the vast and precious Table Mountain National Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.Enjoy stylish city living amid ocean and mountain views at Artea. This Sea Point penthouse is a chic, contemporary space just minutes from the promenade, Clifton and Camps Bay beaches, and central Cape Town. Its open-plan design and three bedrooms make it ideal for a getaway with friends or a laid-back holiday with family.Take in views from the ocean to Lion’s Head and the city from the villa’s private rooftop deck, which features a pool, sitting and dining areas, and a barbecue. A second balcony has additional space for dining. After the sun sets on a day of sightseeing, unwind in front of the TV, put a favorite album on the sound system or share photos via Wi-Fi.Artea is laid out around an open-concept great room that’s flooded with light by floor-to-ceiling windows. There’s plenty of seating on the sleek sofa and lounge chairs or around the pedestal dining table, and the kitchen is fully equipped. A collection of original artwork complements the refined furnishings for an ambience of modern luxury.The penthouse has one master suite with a king bed and en-suite bathroom, and two bedrooms with queen beds that share a bathroom. Like the great room, the bedrooms have large windows, laminate floors and their own art pieces, making each one a stylish haven.With Camps Bay Beach within walking distance of this vacation rental, you’re just a few minutes away from a honeymoon-worthy stroll on the sand or dinner at an oceanfront restaurant. Make the short drive to Table Mountain and take the cable car to the top of this Cape Town icon, plan a hike or two around Lion’s Head and the Twelve Apostles, or drive into the city center and explore.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Bedroom 2: Queen size bed, Shared bathroom with bedroom 3 with stand-alone shower & bathtub

listing.listing_description: Villa Yenmoz is located in an enclosed park sector of Bab Atlas Palmeraie, just five minutes outside of Marrakech. Although close to the city, once you enter Yenmoz lush, expertly manicured grounds, you’d never know it. Designed to promote tranquility, serenity, and relaxation, Villa Yenmoz is the perfect host for a retreat with friends or colleagues, as well as any other special event that requires outdoor space.Traditional and authentic Moroccan design is showcased on the Yenmoz estate. Inspired by the red-clay houses of Morocco’s ancient villagers, Yenmoz is a unique vacation spot for visitors who wish to immerse themselves in the local culture. Beautiful works of art add splashes of color to the warm and inviting living room. Decorated with designer furniture and high-end electronics, this villa manages to maintain modern elegance and luxury, while portraying Morocco’s natural, slightly rustic influence. The kitchen, however, is all modern and sure to inspire your inner chef with its state of the art appliances and functional layout.Inside, you’ll find the villa’s fully equipped kitchen, with state of the art appliances, and a breakfast table. The formal dining area and the alfresco set both have seating for eight. After dinner, spend the night on the terrace, enjoying the gardens, and maybe a late-night swim. If you’d prefer a night in, Yenmoz has a television, a wood burning fireplace, air conditioning, and Wi-Fi. And, the villa comes with a butler, daily cleaning service, security, and airport transfer.When it’s time to venture beyond the walls of Yenmoz, you won’t have far to travel before you’re engulfed by the vibrant downtown core of Marrakech. Start with the square of Djemaa El-Fna if you want to jump right into the excitement, you’ll find musicians, dancers, snake charmers, and hundreds of stalls serving up unique local delicacies and souvenirs. Right next to the square is The Souks, Marrakech’s main marketplace, where you can buy almost anything.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Breathtaking views over the Atlantic, resort-worthy outdoor living areas and contemporary architecture add up to a fantasy come true at Camps Bay Dream. Whether you’re entertaining as the sun sets over the ocean or relaxing after a day of sightseeing in Cape Town, leave it to this vacation rental to provide an ambience of laid-back luxury.The panoramic views are best enjoyed from the villa’s three levels of private terraces facing the ocean. On the ground level, there’s a spectacular living space with shaded sitting and dining areas, an outdoor kitchen with a barbecue, an infinity pool and a deck with loungers in the sun; other levels feature sitting areas. Inside, the villa’s amenities range from the spa-worthy to the high-tech, including a sauna, Wi-Fi, grand piano and wine cellar.Sleek and modern, the villa is laid out around an open-plan great room whose glass wall takes in vistas from the Twelve Apostles across Camps Bay to Lion’s Head and Table Mountain. In addition to the main-level sitting area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen, there’s a ground-level bar and kitchen area that opens to the pool terrace for easy entertaining.There are four bedrooms in the main house and one in the guest house; together, they can accommodate parties of up to ten friends or family members. In the main house, there are three bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, and one bedroom with a king bed and shared hall bathroom. With its king bed, en-suite bathroom and separate entrance, the guest house makes the perfect haven for the couple still on honeymoon.With the boutiques, oceanfront restaurants and sugary sands of Camps Bay Beach just a 5-minute drive from the villa, you can spend more of your holiday enjoying the spectacular setting. If you’d like to explore beyond Camps Bay, it’s a short drive to Clifton Beach and the attractions of central Cape Town, from the V&A Waterfront to the famous Table Mountain cable car.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The ultra-modern Spa House in secluded Hout Bay is a dazzling three-bedroom villa within easy reach of Cape Town. Designed by an award-winning architect, this property’s floor-to-ceiling glass walls provide spectacular views of the rugged Cape Peninsula Mountain Ranges. With manicured lawns and an oasis-like pool surrounding the sun-kissed façade this is a haven of light, leisure and luxury. Enjoy the best of South African vacations in a shimmering, stylish setting.Surrounded by the iconic hills and azure blue skies of one of South Africa’s most popular coastal strips, Spa House radiates relaxation. You are just a short drive from the sea at Hout Bay, a fishing village teeming with character, restaurants, trawlers and yachts. The vast Atlantic Ocean plays host to this idyllic community and a range of sea life including a seal colony. Explore Hout Bay before returning to your retreat in the hills and the best seats in the house for the Cape’s spectacular sunsets.Enjoy the epitome of modern living with impressive open plan areas blending seamlessly into the outdoors. Towering glass walls provide you with unobstructed views of the jagged mountains. Your main pool deck, dotted with sun loungers, appears to float on an infinite blue lagoon. The mini deck is an adventurous hop across stepping stones. The villa’s enervating marble-clad spa includes steam and massage rooms designed to soothe the soul. It’s time to relax with a book, dive into the clear blue water or be invigorated by your surroundings. Spa House’s sumptuous bedrooms greet you with magnificent views across the mountains, Hout Bay and the lush garden. Light floods every corner of Spa House but at night you can roll down the blinds and cloak yourself with peace and quiet. Each bedroom is bright and airy with top of the range en-suite bathrooms adding a touch of glamour. Air conditioning helps moderate the heat of summer and chilly nights. After a day of Cape discovery there’s no better place to be than in your soft and welcoming king-sized bed.You are in a prime position to make the most of the Cape here at Spa House. Sea adventure and lively nightlife are on offer in popular Hout Bay. The imperious hills rise before you, hinting at the jagged range which features mist-shrouded icon Table Mountain. Close by you can explore the city attractions of bustling Cape Town. But with so much to relish in this hidden gem of a villa you can be forgiven for spending a leisurely day by the pool.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The quintessential rock, sea and sky of the Greek islands appear in all their glory at Villa Etheras. This cliffside Santorini vacation rental was named for ether, believed by the ancient Greeks to be the mystical fifth element from which the world was created along with air, fire, earth and water—and, in their mythology, the pure air breathed by the gods. When you sample its panoramic views, gorgeous terrace and chic interiors, you may enjoy a spiritual experience, too.Set into the rock of the hillside, the villa’s private oceanfront terrace commands views over the caldera and along the coast. Gather around the shaded dining table, stretch out on a seat in the sun or cool off in the infinity pool, which features a lounging platform that appears to be floating on the water’s surface. Inside, a TV, sound system, DVD player, Wi-Fi and air conditioning round out the amenities at this luxury property.The white stucco walls so characteristic of the islands are carried into Villa Etheras, where they wind around an open-concept living room and kitchen. A sleek fireplace surround and polished marble coffee table contrast with the soft slipcovered sofa in the living room; in the fully equipped kitchen, a rock slab is a rugged counterpoint to the minimalist cabinets and breakfast bar.The villa’s two bedrooms are the perfect size for a small family or two couples on holiday together—or even for an indulgent honeymoon in the Santorini sun. Both bedrooms have king beds, en-suite bathrooms and sea views.With a location in the quiet village of Firostefani, Villa Etheras is a short drive from the larger town of Fira and scenic, unpretentious Exo Yalos beach. When it’s time to leave your island retreat, plan on a 7-mile drive from the villa to the ferry docks at Athinios Port Santorini.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

ul.li: Bedroom 1: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with shower/bathtub combo, View of the sea
Bedroom 2: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom, Rain Shower, Television, View of the sea

listing.listing_description: This three bedroom luxury villa enjoys a large private infinity pool with spectacular views of the sea towards Souda Bay and panoramic views of the White Mountains. Anemos is only a 5 minute walk into town and the nearest beach so you can enjoy a leisurely and scenic stroll down the hill. The property is as welcoming inside as it is striking from the outside. What’s more, it’s only a 33 km drive from Chania Airport, so it won’t be long before you’re settled in and enjoying everything it has to offer for a memorable vacation.All your senses will be awakened by the sheer natural beauty of this villa. The unmistakable aroma of a delicious barbecue, fresh off the grill, is carried on the fresh mountain air and mingles with the scent of the lemon trees for a romantic dining experience under the stars, overlooking the private infinity pool. The interior of Anemos is modern with first class amenities. Satellite television, Wi-Fi access and a DVD player are there for your entertainment and if you’re feeling like you want to burn off some of those vacation calories you’ve consumed, there’s fitness equipment in the property for your exclusive use. Just remember not to overdo it, you’re here to relax and enjoy yourself!Wooden floors, rich fabrics and warm colors provide the ideal environment for a selection of family-owned antique furniture, while glass-enclosed marble bathrooms add modern refinement. There are some cool splashes of blue throughout which complement the unmissable sea views.When you need to sleep off a hard day’s relaxing or sightseeing, there are three air conditioned bedrooms which will make you feel right at home. Two of the rooms have en-suite facilities and all of them have televisions so you can watch a movie or a show before drifting off peacefully ahead of another incredible day in Crete. One bedroom has a king size bed with the other two containing two twin beds which can be converted to kings on request.If you can tear yourself away from the various attractions of this wonderful villa, you’ll find a lot to pack into your photo collection just a short trip away. The town is a great place to spend some time and sit with a cold drink watching the world go by. If lying on the beach doing very little is your thing, you’ll only have to venture five minutes from your doorstep before soaking up some rays.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All Rights Reserved.

listing.listing_description: Tucked away in a secluded alcove of Megalochori, within a short stroll from the village square, Villa Io is an ideal hideaway providing peace and privacy. Built into the volcanic rock, the villa once served as the village school to the local children. Today the interior is postcard-perfect, white with beautiful arched interiors. The outdoor area is private and the hand-laid cobbled courtyard complemented by a glistening pool, provides the perfect outdoor space for lazing around on hot summer days. This traditional villa ensures tranquility and a taste of traditional village life. Villa Io is ideal for families looking to experience the true island lifestyle of days gone by without compromising on comfort or convenience.Out in the sunshine you can cool down in the swimming pool, enjoy some al fresco dining or just lounge around with a good book and take it easy. The property comes with a 24 hour concierge and daily maid service. In terms of amenities, you can kick back and watch satellite television or a DVD after you’ve enjoyed another super day in sunny Santorini.The layout of the villa takes the form of traditional Santorini houses. As the village of Megalochori is surrounded by vineyards, the villa continues this theme with unusual light fittings fashioned out of the basket-like vines. The farm-style kitchen is large and fully equipped with an antique dining table and beautifully crafted chairs and modern appliances. Cutlery and crockery are housed in an ornate antique dresser, adding an old-world charm to the kitchen. Through an arched passageway, leading from the kitchen, you will find the comfortable living room with doors leading out to the courtyard and pool.Villa Io accommodates up to six guests and children are welcome. The two main bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, while there is a further sleeping area in the loft with two single beds, ideally suited for children over six years old.There’s a lot to see and do away from the villa during your vacation. You can enjoy a day out at the beach, people-watch in Megalochori village, charter your own boat for the day and take to the ocean (extra costs apply and advance notice may be required) or drive into nearby Fira and Oia and sample a livelier pace of life. Villa Io is a welcoming place to return to each evening.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All Rights Reserved.

feature.p: Bedroom 1: Double bed, Shared access to bathroom with stand-alone bathtub

listing.listing_description: Standing gracefully on 3,000 square meters of gorgeous orchards and landscaped garden near Kolymvari and Chania, the three-bedroom Villa Ianira is a luxury sanctuary with stunning views of the Sea of Crete and White Mountains, offering exquisite privacy and ample space for indoor and outdoor entertainment.The villa's unique design combines ancient elegance, contemporary lines, and cutting-edge principles of environmental harmony. The outdoor terrace features two swimming pools and wide views of the sea and islands. Beside it, under the villa's eaves, the large outdoor lounge is ideal for spending long days and evenings relishing the ocean breeze. The covered alfresco dining table for eight, beside the rustic wood-burning oven and barbeque, is where you'll savor nighttime dinners and lunches in the cool shade. Beyond the terrace, amid the gardens and groves, you'll find lush lawns for sunbathing and a charming playground for children.Indoors, under high, vaulted ceilings, the open-plan living area features a comfortable lounge surrounding a wood-burning fire place and satellite television. With the dining table beside it, ample floor space, and a sound system, the living area welcomes long dinner parties with fine Greek wine and cuisine. Through an antique archway, you'll find the fully equipped kitchen with breakfast bar and splendid exposed masonry. The villa's beautiful wood floors and dreamy lighting create the ideal ambience for enjoying time together with family and friends.The soft tones and natural light of the tastefully minimalist bedrooms will keep you cool during the day and cozy at night. The master bedroom features a king size bed and ocean views from its windows and private balcony, as well as ensuite bathroom with stand-alone bathtub. The second bedroom has two single beds, while the third has a king. Each has an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower, and they share a covered terrace.Beyond the self-contained paradise of Villa Ianira, you're just moments away from the beaches and charm of the western Cretan coast. Hop in your car and drive two minutes to Kolymarvi Beach and Kolymarvi Village, or twenty minutes to Chania, with its restaurants, bars, museums, and breathtaking architecture combining Greek, Roman, and Venetian influences.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Panoramas of sea, sky and spectacular sunsets are on view from Erossea Villa. Set on the west side of Santorini in the picturesque village of Imerovigli, this west-facing vacation rental looks out across the brilliant blue waters of the Aegean. Reserve this newly renovated three-bedroom property for a honeymoon-worthy romantic getaway or a relaxed family holiday in the sun.Your stay at this luxury villa begins with an airport transfer and includes breakfast each day. Take in the vistas from outdoor living spaces with a heated pool, hot tub, loungers in the sun, and shaded sitting and dining areas. A wireless speaker means you can listen to a favorite playlist indoors and out, and Wi-Fi makes it easy to share photos from your trip.Taking inspiration from the traditional Greek village scenes on postcards, the villa is built into the hillside at the top of the caldera. Fresh white stucco forms the backdrop for the open-plan living and dining areas, which are flooded with sunlight from glass doors leading to the terrace and furnished with chic mid-century-style pieces. A fully equipped kitchenette is tucked into the open-concept space as well.Erossea Villa has two bedrooms with queen beds in the main villa—one with an en-suite bathroom and one with a hall bathroom—and one in a guest suite with its own queen bed and en-suite bathroom. Accessed via an exterior staircase, the guest suite is a private retreat within the property.From the villa’s setting in the village of Imerovigli, it’s a short drive to the island’s capital and several beaches, including the pebbled shores of Kamari and the black sands of Perissa. Don’t miss the chance to glimpse Santorini’s long history on a walk through the ruins at nearby Ancient Thira.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

ul.li: Bedroom 1: Queen size bed, Access to hall bathroom with stand-alone shower, Television, Safe

listing.listing_description: Find a private enclave just a few miles outside the bustling center of Marrakech at Dar Tifiss. Set on more than an acre of lush gardens in the Bab Atlas area, this gorgeous Morocco vacation rental boasts space for ten in its more than 5,000 square feet of living space and five bedrooms. Let the full-time staff pamper you, so you can enjoy more time with friends and family.The staff includes a butler and housekeeper who will attend to your needs throughout your holiday. Spend your time swimming in the pool, lounging on the sunny terrace, trying your luck on the pétanque court, stretching out in the exercise and massage rooms, or swapping stories around the al-fresco dining table. The villa also has a TV, sound system and Wi-Fi.Thanks to a recent renovation, the villa’s interiors feel bright and sophisticated. The open-concept living and dining areas are separated by a double-sided fireplace, and feature several sets of French doors to the terrace, geometric fabrics and artwork, and plenty of seating. There is a fully equipped kitchen, but it is exclusively for staff use.There are four bedrooms in the main house at this luxury property and one in a guest house with a separate entrance; all five have en-suite bathrooms. The main house has one bedroom with a king bed, one bedroom with two twin beds, and two bedrooms with queen beds. In the guest house, you’ll find two twin beds, plus a fireplace and lounge area.While Dar Tifiss is quiet and welcoming, it’s not far from activities and attractions. Avid players will appreciate the short drive to Atlas Golf Resort and Golf Amelkis, while sightseers won’t want to miss a visit to the always-lively Jemaa el-Fna public square. Wander the streets of the medina in Marrakech, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, then sit down to a honeymoon-worthy dinner in one of the city’s up-and-coming restaurants.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Reserve a private oasis just outside Marrakech at Villa Grace. This charming vacation rental within view of the Atlas Mountains has resort-worthy outdoor areas, recently updated interiors and an attentive staff. Use it as a place to relax with family, for a getaway with friends to the two nearby golf courses, or as a base for exploring the city’s markets and museums.Your holiday at Villa Grace begins with an airport transfer and includes the services of a cook, butler, housekeeper and security staff. The residence sits on nearly three acres of manicured grounds, where you’ll find two swimming pools, a terrace with loungers and al-fresco dining for twelve. Inside, the villa boasts a hammam area with a sauna and hot tub, a pool table, a TV and Wi-Fi.Polished stone floors and ornate moldings lend a traditional elegance to the villa’s several sitting areas—including two separated by a cozy wood-burning fireplace. Touches of red, orange and chocolate brown create a warm, inviting ambience. The dining area seats ten in a bright space that opens to the terrace, and while there is cook service, there is also a fully equipped kitchen.There are four bedrooms in the main house at this luxury property and two in a guest house; all six have queen beds and en-suite bathrooms, and open to a terrace. With its separate accommodations, the guest house is perfect for a family traveling with younger children, in-laws wanting privacy or even a honeymoon-style retreat for a couple.The peaceful enclave of Villa Grace is just a short drive from two golf courses and central Marrakech. If you can tear yourself away from the pools, it’s well worth browsing the city’s medina for a souvenir or two, exploring its museums and gardens, and sampling its restaurants.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Settle into a laid-back routine of beach time, braai and exploring Cape Town at Blinkwater Villa with a 5-star grading from the Tourism Grading Council of South Africa. Though it’s set on a leafy, residential cul-de-sac, this contemporary vacation rental is only a few minutes’ walk from Camps Bay and its beach, and a few minutes’ drive from highlights like Table Mountain and the city center. The architect-designed interiors and four suite-style bedrooms can be shared by up to eight guests.Unwind in the shadow of Lion’s Head on private terraces with loungers and a pool, and alfresco dining for ten. Watch the stars come out over the mountains from the outdoor living areas or finish the evening inside around the TV and sound system, sharing photos of your day via Wi-Fi.Sliding glass doors link the open-concept great room of Blinkwater Villa to the terraces for stunning views of the bay and hills. Sleek contemporary furnishings give the living and dining areas a feel of modern luxury, and, in the fully equipped kitchen, you’ll find stylishly minimal cabinets along with a practical breakfast bar and state-of-the-art appliances.The villa’s four bedrooms, each with an en-suite bathroom, are well suited to groups of friends or extended family on holiday together. There are three with king beds and one with a queen bed; all open to terraces or a courtyards that have been thoughtfully landscaped with indigenous plants.Nestled between Table Mountain and the Atlantic Ocean, Camps Bay is one of Cape Town’s trendiest areas—and Blinkwater Villa is in the heart of it. It’s only a 4-minute walk to the beach, which is popular with locals and visitors alike, and 10 minutes to the downtown area, where you can browse unique shops, grab a coffee at a hip new spot or book a honeymoon-worthy dinner at an oceanfront restaurant. With Table Mountain, Lion’s Head, the Twelve Apostles and central Cape Town all less than 15 minutes away by car, you’ll have no trouble exploring this vibrant city.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note: Villa Alpha is a semi-detached property and can be booked alongside Villa Votsalo (https://www.luxuryretreats.com/vacation-rentals/greece/crete/chania/villa-votsalo-120554) to make up the Youphoria Beachfront Estate (https://www.luxuryretreats.com/vacation-rentals/greece/crete/chania/youphoria-beachfront-estate-120556)! Please inquire with your Villa Specialist for more details!If you’re looking for an amazing vacation, you can’t beat true beachfront property. Villa Alpha is steps from the sandy coast line of Kissamos Bay. With crystal clear, calm water and a private location, Kissamos Bay is perfect for first time snorkelers, a family fishing trip, or just soaking up the sun while you enjoy your beachfront vacation home.A minimalistic approach to interior decoration allows Crete’s unique features to remain the focal point of your getaway. Turquoise water, bright blue sky, and glowing sunlight set the tone throughout the Villa Alpha property. Wide openings from the interior to the terrace ensure that fresh ocean breeze easily flows through Alpha’s living spaces. High-end furniture and state of the art electronics are the living room’s decor. The formal dining area has space for four, and there’s alfresco dining on the terrace as well. The kitchen is fully equipped with top notch appliances and plenty of countertop workspace.You’ll always feel calm, cool, and connected at Villa Alpha. With television, air conditioning, a sound system, and Wi-Fi, you’ll have everything you need. The two master bedrooms both feature en-suite bathrooms with stand-alone showers and access to the terrace. Once outside, you’ll love the outdoor furniture around the infinity pool, it’s the perfect place to have a glass of wine and watch the sun set.Nearby, the Chania region is well known as an archaeological hot spot. With several significant findings throughout its history, Chania is home to some amazing museums. The city itself has the charm of an old fishing village, because that’s what it has always been. So take some time to explore the taverns, restaurants, and local markets in Chania, if you’re a seafood lover, you’re in the right place.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

ul.li: Bedroom 1: Queen size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower, Terrace

listing.listing_description: Revel in the timeless beauty of the Greek hills and waters at the Elounda Aegean Pool Villa. This stunning vacation rental is set on a rise overlooking the Gulf of Mirabello on the northeastern coast of Crete, just outside the village of Elounda—a quiet area with a starkly lovely landscape. Enjoy the charming interiors, luxury amenities and three bedrooms with up to six friends or family members.Your holiday at the villa includes complimentary breakfast and daily maid service. Follow the Aegean sun across the sky from a private terrace with a pool, hot tub, plenty of lounge chairs and an al-fresco dining area overlooking the sea. As night falls, stay out to stargaze, flip on the television or sound system, or join the Wi-Fi network to post your favorite snaps from the day.Inside, the villa is the picture of traditional elegance—without skimping on modern convenience. Classic pieces like a roll-arm sofa and glass chandelier adorn the living and dining rooms, where there’s room for all six guests. The sleek, fully equipped kitchen is open to the other living spaces, making it easy to fetch a snack and a pleasure to prepare meals.The exquisite master bedroom at the Elounda Aegean Pool Villa has a queen bed, en-suite bathroom and sea views. The other two bedrooms have two twin beds each and views of the garden, and share a bathroom. Hand-painted trompe l’oeil ceilings and marble accents extend the villa’s luxe traditional look even to its bathrooms.As part of the Elounda Gulf Villas community, the property offers guests complimentary shuttle service to a private beach club, where you’ll find sunbeds, umbrellas, beach towels and, of course, Crete’s beautifully clear waters. Take a day trip to the charming fishing village of Elounda for a walk around the harbor or a meal at an oceanfront cafe, or to the livelier coastal town of Agios Nikolaos for a honeymoon-worthy dinner or a memorable night out.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: From its luxurious perch on the slope of Lion’s Head, Villa Kasbah enjoys scenic views of the city and ocean. With four en-suite bedrooms, this stylish rental is ideal for a family getaway, trip with friends, or a high-end corporate retreat. In just ten minutes, you’ll have access to pristine beachfront at Clifton and Camps Bay, as well as all the amenities of V&A Waterfront and Cape Town’s vibrant city center.Wide, column-supported, archways lead guests around the main floor’s scenic terrace, as well as in through the spacious open concept living room, inviting the fresh sea breeze and natural sunlight as well. Once inside, you’ll surely appreciate Kasbah’s elegant decor, featuring designer furniture, chandelier lighting, and gorgeous stained wood accents. In the kitchen, your inner chef will love the functional layout and restaurant-caliber appliances. Outside, you’ll find plenty of smaller living spaces, decorated with sun loungers and alfresco dining sets, all surrounding the saltwater pool.Villa Kasbah’s ocean view is ever-present throughout the villa’s terrace, common areas, and bedrooms. The fully equipped kitchen, formal and alfresco dining areas, barbecue, and scenic backdrop make Kasbah the perfect host for an elegant dinner soiree. The villa is also outfitted with Wi-Fi and television to help keep you connected. And, the master bedroom features a king sized bed, walk-in closet, private balcony, and an en-suite with a shower and bathtub.Although the amazing ocean view from the balcony is Kasbah’s main focal point, if you turn around, you’ll see Lion’s Head, Cape Town’s most prominent natural feature. If you’re up to the challenge, hiking up Lion’s Head takes about ninety-minutes, and once on top, you’ll be rewarded with some of the best views in the country. After you’ve taken a few pictures, head back down to the city center of Cape Town and reward yourself again, with a spectacular meal at Reverie Social Table, The Pot Luck Club, Dash, or one of the city’s other fine dining establishments.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The sea on one side, mountains on the other—this contemporary South African villa looks over photo-ready scenery from all angles. The aquamarine infinity pool has a completely unobstructed view of the town below. Strategically placed skylights and windows illuminate the sleek black, white, and stainless steel colour scheme. Cape Town is a 10-minute drive away where you’ll have access to seafood restaurants, spas, and a vibrant nightlife. One of the finest beaches in the area, Camps Bay Beach is within walking distance. Lay your towel down on the soft white sand and spend the day soaking up rays and waves. If you forget to pack a bag, don’t worry—sunscreen, food and drinks, as well as loungers and umbrellas are available for purchase nearby. Lion’s Head mountain provides a dramatic backdrop to the city; snap a photo for your Instagram after making the 90-minute trek to the top, taking in the 360⁰ sights around you.An at-home cook provides breakfast and lunch that you can savour either inside or alfresco, both with seating for 8. Happy hour won’t be complete without a glass of wine from Constantia, the region’s vineyard, which is only a short drive away. Terrace loungers are the perfect place to curl up while watching the vivid sunset unfurl against the palm trees and city beyond. Set the mood with your favourite playlist by plugging into the outdoor sound system.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Open yourself to unexpected moments at La Sorpresa. Contemporary architecture, sea views and the balmy Costa del Sol weather create a relaxed, inviting ambience at this luxury Marbella vacation rental, whose name means “the surprise.” Invite up to eight friends or family to see what serendipity awaits.Set on a peaceful, private hillside amid pine and cork trees, La Sorpresa opens to an expansive terrace overlooking the mountains and sea. Settle into a lounge chair in the sun, swim in the long infinity pool or barbecue local seafood to serve at the al-fresco dining area. Inside, the villa’s features include an exercise area, steam room, games room and wine cellar.The villa’s bright, open-plan interiors incorporate modern luxuries in a stylish way. The rooms are linked by traditional brick archways, the sweeping staircase is adorned with wrought iron, and the living and dining areas open to the terrace through huge sliding glass doors. There’s plenty of space for everyone to gather on the sectional in the living room, the wicker chairs around the dining table and at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.The four bedrooms at La Sorpresa can easily accommodate groups of friends or families on holiday together. There are three bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms: a master suite with a king bed, and two bedrooms with queen beds and private terraces. The fourth bedroom has a king bed, a single bunk bed and shares a hall bathroom.Though the villa feels secluded, it’s only a short drive from some of the best beaches and prettiest towns along the Costa del Sol. Make the 5-minute trip to San Pedro for a relaxed afternoon on golden sand underneath fragrant eucalyptus trees, or the 15-minute drive to Playa Puerto Banus to stroll the boardwalk and play in the warm, shallow water. There’s a golf course just 10 minutes away, and everything from souvenir shops to honeymoon-worthy dining in downtown Marbella, 15 minutes away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Savor the Cape Town sun and sea breeze at the chic, contemporary 15 Ottawa. This Camps Bay vacation rental has bright, airy indoor and outdoor living areas facing the ocean, and is just a short drive from the beach. Its four suite-style bedrooms can host up to ten friends or family members in modern luxury.You’ll want to spend most of your holiday at the pool area just above the villa, which has incredible sea views and thoughtful amenities. Settle into a lounge chair on the sunny pool terrace or stretch out on one of the sofas in the shade of the pool house while sipping a drink from the kitchenette. As the sun sinks toward the ocean, heat up the barbecue and flip on the sound system or plasma TV for the evening’s entertainment.With an open-plan great room and sleek modern style, the main villa is just as appealing as the pool house. A vaulted ceiling stretches over a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar, a dining area that seats ten in trendy Marais and Louis Ghost chairs, and an inviting sitting area anchored by a sectional and dark, dramatic feature wall. At the front of the great room, a casual lounge area opens to a sunny deck and can be curtained off from the rest of the space for a private beach-cabana feel.Each of the four bedrooms at 15 Ottawa has an en-suite bathroom for guests’ privacy and comfort. There are two bedrooms with king beds and sea views, including a honeymoon-worthy suite with its own jetted tub, and two bedrooms with queen beds.The villa’s Clifton location puts guests within easy reach of the beach, mountains and Cape Town city center. It’s less than 10 minutes by car from 15 Ottawa to the white sands of Clifton Beach or Camps Bay Beach, popular with everyone from local families to surfers to the jet set, as well as the iconic Table Mountain, Lion’s Head and the Twelve Apostles that rear above the city. Start your exploration of central Cape Town at the charming V&A Waterfront, about 15 minutes away, which is home to both brand-new shops and restaurants and South Africa’s oldest working harbor.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Find a Winelands idyll at The Residence at Vrede en Lust. Tucked into the picturesque Franschhoek Valley on the 330-year-old Vrede en Lust Wine Estate, this vacation rental is a sophisticated retreat in a gorgeous rural setting. Spend your holiday exploring the area’s golf courses, spas and galleries—or board the region’s wine tram and find your new favorite vintage.Your stay at The Residence includes housekeeping service, breakfast and a complimentary wine tasting at Vrede en Lust. Watch the sun move across the surrounding hills from private outdoor living areas with a swimming pool, lounging and dining furniture, a bar, a barbecue and a sound system, then linger after sunset around the firepit. Or enjoy indoor amenities ranging from a gym and office space to a streaming TV, sound system and Wi-Fi.The outdoor spaces connect seamlessly with interiors whose architectural charm and comfortable furnishings create a feel of laid-back luxury. With several sitting areas, a dining table that seats twelve and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar, you can spend a quiet moment reading or reconnect with the whole group of friends and family over a meal.The Residence has four bedrooms with king beds, including two honeymoon-worthy suites with their own lounge areas and balconies. The other two bedrooms have two twin beds each. All six bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning.With Franschhoek only a 10-minute drive from the villa, it’s easy to spend the day touring the area’s galleries, teeing off at nearby golf courses or indulging at a range of spas. For something a little wilder, make the 10-minute drive to Drakenstein Lion Park. Of course, you can always take the Franschhoek Wine Tram, which has a stop at Vrede en Lust, and see the area without having to drive at all.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Light is at the heart of this secluded Santorini villa, with brilliant white walls, courtyard and a blue pearl of a swimming pool. Appreciate the decorative light touches inside, ranging from the myriad bathroom lamps to the underlit luxury beds. Breakfast on the sun terrace and plan a great day exploring the pebble beaches, wineries and and historical villages of this unique Mediterranean island.Located on the outskirts of one of Santorini’s most charming towns, Eolia Kamari Villa offers both comfort and seclusion. Built on the foundations of a traditional Greek farmhouse, the villa retains those dimensions, providing a cozy but luxury experience. From the gleaming, fully modernized kitchen, prepare a fresh Greek meal to be enjoyed on the wooden dining table that sits in pleasant shade on the terrace. A plunge into the impressive pool is an ever-present option, while the plushly-outfitted living room offers both personality and comfort.Located to the south-east of the island, Kamari Villa avoids the major crowds that congregate around the more northerly towns of Santorini. The local town of Kamari nevertheless offers fantastic Greek cuisine and bars, with unique options like the historical Cinema Vilatzio. A range of beaches are just a short drive away, while exceptional historical sites like the cliffside Antik necropolis are also conveniently close to the villa, offering a special insight into the ancient past of this dramatic landscape. End the day with a refreshing bottle of local wine, to cap off an ideal day on the island. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: With Camps Bay Beach below and Lion’s Head and the Twelve Apostles above, Hely Horizon feels like it’s in the middle of a postcard. But it has function as well as form: this beautiful modern vacation rental has two levels of indoor and outdoor living areas, and five spacious bedrooms that can accommodate ten. Spend your holiday reveling in the quiet, private location or making the short drive to the beaches, mountains and central Cape Town.The mountains loom behind and a lush garden stretches out in front of the villa. In the morning, stretch out on a lounger on the covered lower-level terrace by the pool, challenge family and friends to games on the lawn and break for lunch at the poolside table. In the afternoon, adjourn to a seat on the upper-level deck, watch the sun sink toward the ocean and end the evening with a bottle of local wine at the al-fresco dining area.Hely Horizon has two levels of open-plan living spaces: one that opens to the pool terrace and one that opens to the deck with ocean views. The upper level has a sleek, airy feel, with a sloping roof and clerestory windows that give a peek at the mountains from the sectional around the fireplace in the sitting area and the woven chairs in the dining area. Downstairs, tones of deep blue and white echo the colors of the sea. Both levels have fully equipped—and very stylish—kitchens.Five bedrooms with ocean views offer luxury accommodations for up to ten guests. There are three bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, including a master suite with a king bed and two bedrooms with queen beds. The other two bedrooms have king beds and share a bathroom—a great setup for parents traveling with children.Iconic scenery, relaxed beaches and vibrant dining and shopping scenes make Cape Town a wonderful spot for outdoor adventurers, sun-seekers, honeymooners and even families. Though Hely Horizon is in a tranquil residential neighborhood, it’s less than a 10-minute drive from Camps Bay Beach, Clifton Beach and landmarks like Table Mountain. Start your exploration of central Cape Town at the V&A Waterfront, less than 15 minutes from the villa, which has brand new boutiques and restaurants but is also South Africa’s oldest working port.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Positioned for 360-degree views, you can find the Aegean Sea, Cretan Mountains, and sprawling valleys of Rethymno at this modern villa. Sip your morning tea at the smaller, ocean-facing bistro set while the kids play on the jungle gym. Swim a few laps in the pool to warm up before heading to the Blue Flag awarded, Adelianos Kampos Beach. It’s just a few minutes from home.Orizontes borrows inspiration from the traditional architectural style of the Cyclades, adding a delightfully modern touch. Rounded edges get straightened out. Small circular windows turn into landscape capturing floor-to-ceiling openings. In the living room, a floating staircase opens the space even more. Let the fully-equipped kitchen inspire your creative side and try your hand at a traditional Greek dish. After dinner at the alfresco set, pour yourself another glass of wine and sink into the soothing hot tub.Rethymno is one of the most well-preserved Renaissance cities in Greece, as well as a haven for outdoor enthusiasts. Wander the ancient streets to find incredible architecture, traditional Greek restaurants, and boutique shops. Just outside the city, you’ll find hiking trails, gorges, caves, and even more pristine beachfront. Follow the coast east, and you’ll find the beautiful city of Heraklion, which is known for its famous Archeological Museum.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing_cancellation_info.cancellation: Cancel up to 30 days before your trip and only pay 50% of the total accommodation fees for the reservation. Cancel within 30 days of the trip and the reservation is non-refundable.

listing.listing_description: Cape Kloof is a superb villa in the Gardens neighborhood of Cape Town, a tranquil and trendy enclave within the city limits, just a short drive from Clifton Beach and Lion’s Head. The masterful design balances modernism and naturalism, harmonizing beautifully with the landscape and maximizing the mountain and ocean views. An impressive array of amenities create an inspiring haven for families, groups of friends, and business travelers, including an outdoor swimming pool, home office, gym, and gourmet kitchen. Four lovely bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms give comfort and privacy to eight guests.The villa is perched on a lush, wooded hillside between the peaks of Lion's Head and Table Mountain, their profiles hovering majestically in view. Vanishing walls join the pool deck with the capacious interior, creating a graceful flow of space and ocean breezes. Enjoy a dip in the pool while gazing out at the vast horizon, and sip local wine on the outdoor sofa as the sun sets over the Atlantic.The open-concept living room features a gorgeous cocktail lounge gazing out on the sweeping vista, as well as a comfy TV lounge with fireplace. Plentiful glass doors, skylights, and clerestory windows flood the space with natural light. The kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances, and there are multiple areas to enjoy drinks, appetizers, and meals. The home cinema is perfect for watching your favorite films on the projector screen.On the lower level, the master suite opens directly to the gardens, an interior lounge, and the home office—giving the ample feeling of a private cottage. The room includes a king bed, walk-in closet, and ensuite bathroom with dual vanity, shower, and tub. The main guestroom also features a king bed, desk, and deluxe bathroom with shower and tub.There is hardly a finer location for experiencing the natural and cultural riches of the Western Cape, with exceptional hiking and outdoor sports within easy reach, and the chic towns and beaches at Clifton and Camps Bay just minutes away. The Gardens neighborhood itself is brimming with restaurants, hotels, and bars—the nocturnal counterpart to its rich creative industry.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
